actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To provide for the establishment of an interpretive center and museum at Fort Peck Dam, Montana, and to provide further protection for significant fossil remains in the vicinity of Fort Peck Dam.
short_title: Fort Peck Paleontological Protection and Interpretation Act
subjects: Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Fort Peck Paleontological Protection and Interpretation Act - Authorizes the Secretary of the Army (Secretary) to design, construct, and equip an interpretive center and museum, to be located on project lands of the Army Corps of Engineers at Fort Peck Dam, Montana. Requires the Secretary of Agriculture to transfer, without reimbursement, a specified parcel of real property to the Secretary's administrative jurisdiction to be administered as part of the project lands of the Army Corps of Engineers at Fort Peck Dam. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Fort Peck Paleontological Protection and Interpretation Act
To provide for the establishment of an interpretive center and museum at Fort Peck Dam, Montana, and to provide further protection for significant fossil remains in the vicinity of Fort Peck Dam.
